title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not update immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application and navigate to the label settings.
2. Change the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label height remains the same despite the font size modification.
OB: The label height is not changing immediately after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: The label height should update dynamically to match the new font size when modified in the UI.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the label settings.
2. Change the font size of the label.
3. Verify that the label height updates to match the new font size in real-time.
